description.en:
We make saving the planet simple. Buy, use or sell our token and you’re creating a positive impact in the fight against climate change. We use the blockchain to verify and prove that. Track your own, verifiable data. Clean and Simple.

Reverse token uses reflection to transform a percentage of the transaction into funding carbon removals. Initially, the funds will be used on existing projects, but in time, they will fund innovative solutions in the future such as kelp reforestation and food, feed and fertilizer projects. This will decrease the current cost of carbon removals and increase positive impact on climate change per dollar spent.

Do good, get rewarded. As long as you’re holding RVRS you’ll receive rewards. You receive additional tokens from reflection - no need to stake! There will be NFT rewards related to your positive impact on the environment.
